ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( $Profile.Name!="System Administrator", NOT($Permission.Validation_Rule_Exemption), Insurance_Partner__c != null, Subsidy_Channel_Partner_Count__c>=1, Subsidy_SKU_Count__c>=1, IF( Insurance_Partner__r.DSA_Required__c=true, OR(TEXT(LOI_Status__c) != 'Signed'), TEXT(LOI_Status__c) != 'Signed' ), ISCHANGED( StageName ), OR(TEXT(StageName)='Closing', TEXT(StageName)='Orders Processing') )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Cannot move deal to closing without the correct documentation to support an insurance subsidy deal. Please contact the #insurance-partners slack channel if you have any questions
